name: Life & Death II: The Brain
overview: In Life and Death, you assumed the awesome responsibility of a surgeon in a modern hospital. Now, prepare yourself for the ultimate medical adventure: The Brain Equipped with the latest in high-tech equipment, including Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI's), CAT scanner and Ultrasound, you must diagnose and treat extraordinary cases of neurological dysfunction. And when the time comes to operate, you must pick up the knife, the drill and the bone saw and delve into the mysterious depths of the human brain. "Welcome to the Neurosurgery Wing of Toolworks General, Doctor." A new, large medical center with more rooms and more characters enhance this already unique experience. Expanded classroom features allow you to learn the intricacies of neurosurgery before operating on patients. Stunning, full color graphics and digitized sound technology bring everything to life. The fate of the patient is in your hands. Only you can make the decisions that will mean the difference between Life and Death. Are you up to the challenge?
